REQUIREMENT_TEXT:
To start fishing you need: **{{item}}**
Once you have it, use `{{prefix}}fish` and you can play with buttons.
If you want instant mode: `{{prefix}}fish auto`

Zones: `{{prefix}}fish zones`
COOLDOWN_TEXT: You're still tired from fishing. Come back in **{{time}}**.
ERROR_GENERIC: I couldn't process your fishing right now.
PLAY_SCENE_DOORS_PROMPT: Three boxes. One has the perfect bait. Choose quickly.
PLAY_SCENE_WIRES_PROMPT: There are four hooks. One is the ‚Äúlucky one‚Äù. Which do you pick?
HELP_TEXT:
Press a zone to fish.
You need the required item in your inventory.
The command also works by text: **.fish <zone>**
PANEL_ZONE_NOT_FOUND_TEXT: That zone doesn't exist on this page.
ZONE_NOT_FOUND_TEXT:
I can't find the **{{zone}}** zone.
Use `{{prefix}}fish zones` to see the button panel.
ZONE_REQUIREMENT_TEXT:
To fish in **{{zone}}** you need: **{{item}}**

Tip: check your zones with `{{prefix}}fish zones`.
